body:
Comment 8 by **atkaaz**: 
You are right, something is locking it, it's cmdagent.exe(and also cfp.exe later on)
from comodo firewall(which also has a defense+ thing which is "completely" disabled). I
had completely dismissed it from doing any locking but procmon proved me wrong. I'll try
again after removing comodo and if it still happens(doubt it) I'll let you know.
 I'm sorry. I think you may close this because this explains it.
